question: As per the recent notification from the RBI, banks can deploy money drawn from 1 trillion-on-tap TLTRO in how many sectors?
explanation:
The Reserve Bank of India on Wednesday announced that banks can deploy money drawn from Rs 1 trillion on-tap targeted long-term repo operations (on-tap TLTRO) in six sectors.
The six sectors are agriculture, agri-infrastructure, secured retail, MSMEs, and drugs, pharmaceuticals and healthcare. The money availed has to be deployed in corporate bonds, commercial paper and non-convertible debentures issued by the entities in specific sectors.
